"Segreto": "Hello... It's a pleasure to meet you..."
"If you aren't... Then would you like me to teach you?"
"Very well... Let me know if you're ever interested..."
"Each weapon has... a unique hidden ability..."
"You can unlock the potential of your weapon... by having it treated with catalytic materials."
"So... you'll need both ores... and Photons to catalyse them..."
"Here... I'll give you some of mine... So go try it out at the Item Lab."
"All it takes is a weapon... and some Photon-catalysed \"ores\"..."
"I wonder what secrets... your weapons have hidden within them..."
"All that's left... is for you to uncover them..."
